metadata.title: RZ/V: Can multiple AI models be executed by the DRP-AI?

sections.content:
Question:
Can multiple AI models be executed?
Answer:
Multiple AI models cannot be executed at the same time, but an AI model that has been stored in DRAM beforehand can be switched to quickly and then processed exclusively.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L, RZ/V2M
